meta.name: description
meta.content: White River School District 416 is located in Buckley, WA.

a.span: Ensuring high levels of learning for each student preparing them for success beyond high school.

li.a: Strategic Plan: The White River Promise
February 11th Educational Programs and Operations Levy

img.alt: students joining in a fun march holding icecream cone flames
three students posing with hornet mascot

div.div: White River School District is strongly focused on providing the best education possible to prepare our students for successes during their school years and beyond. White River School District is a great place to learn, work and grow. We offer a wealth of excellent opportunities for students and staff at all levels. Our goal is to make learning relevant, challenging and fun. Our highly qualified staff encourage students to become inquisitive, lifelong learners.

h3.a: While our doors may be closed, we are still working.

div.div:
If you have a specific question for someone in a school or department, please go to our website www.whiteriver.wednet.edu and contact that school or department directly by phone or email to arrange the best way to address your question. Communication options might include email, phone call, zoom meeting. We are working hard to do our part to flatten the curve during this pandemic, while also continuing essential services for our staff and community.
We will be continuing our daily food service program as well as our childcare service.
White River School District schools will be closed starting Monday, March 16, 2020 through April 24, 2020.

h3.a: Birth to 5 is the time to get your child Ready! for Kindergarten!

div.div: Free parent workshops, dinner, and childcare provided. Check out the flyer for more info

article.aria-label: Last Day of School - Early Release

h3.a: Last Day of School - Early Release

div.span: two girls smiling at the camera

div.p: White River School District is committed to providing a website that is accessible to the widest possible audience, regardless of technology or ability. We are actively working to increase the accessibility and usability of our website so that meet WCAG 2.0 AA guidelines over time. For any questions or concerns about accessibility, functionality or for any assistance, please contact Elizabeth Snodgrass via email or phone at 360-829-3814. All reasonable efforts to address requests and ensure that content is accessible to you will be made.
